title: [OpenMP] Allow begin/end declare variant in executable context
body: We are missing a few declerative directives in the parser for executable and declerative directives causing us to error out if they are inside of functions. This adds support for begin/end declare variant by reusing the logic we used in global scope.
commits:
[OpenMP] Allow begin/end declare variant in executable context

We are missing a few declerative directives in the parser for executable
and declerative directives causing us to error out if they are inside of
functions. This adds support for begin/end declare variant by reusing
the logic we used in global scope.
